Address Space - ETROC2:
PeriStat3 - 0b10011101 to 0b00101010
PeriStat4 - 0b01111010 to 0b01111001
SEU Counter 0 - 0b01010111 to 0b01101000
PixStat1 Pixel 4,0 - 0b10000110 to 0b10001110
PixStat1 Pixel 9,0 - 0b11000110 to 0b11100110
PixStat6 Pixel 9,0 - 0b00000000 to 0b00000001
PixStat3 Pixel 10,0 - 0b11000001 to 0b11000000
PixStat1 Pixel 5,1 - 0b11001000 to 0b10001000
PixStat3 Pixel 5,1 - 0b11000001 to 0b11000011
PixStat1 Pixel 7,1 - 0b11001000 to 0b01001000
PixStat2 Pixel 7,1 - 0b10100110 to 0b10100100
PixStat2 Pixel 10,1 - 0b10011101 to 0b10010101
PixStat1 Pixel 12,1 - 0b11001000 to 0b11000000
PixStat1 Pixel 13,1 - 0b11001000 to 0b01001000
PixStat2 Pixel 14,1 - 0b10101010 to 0b10101000
PixStat5 Pixel 10,2 - 0b00000000 to 0b00010000
PixStat1 Pixel 12,2 - 0b01000010 to 0b01100010
PixStat2 Pixel 14,2 - 0b10100101 to 0b10000101
PixStat2 Pixel 0,3 - 0b10011111 to 0b00011111
PixStat2 Pixel 4,3 - 0b10100100 to 0b00100100
PixStat2 Pixel 5,3 - 0b10011111 to 0b00011111
PixStat2 Pixel 10,3 - 0b10010110 to 0b00010110
PixStat1 Pixel 13,3 - 0b11001000 to 0b01001000
PixStat5 Pixel 3,4 - 0b00000000 to 0b00010000
PixStat5 Pixel 4,4 - 0b00000000 to 0b00000100
PixStat6 Pixel 5,4 - 0b00000000 to 0b10000000
PixStat2 Pixel 13,4 - 0b10100000 to 0b10100001
PixStat2 Pixel 3,5 - 0b10100010 to 0b10100011
PixStat5 Pixel 7,5 - 0b00000000 to 0b00000100
PixStat2 Pixel 9,5 - 0b10100011 to 0b10100001
PixStat5 Pixel 11,5 - 0b00000000 to 0b00000010
PixStat2 Pixel 13,5 - 0b10101001 to 0b00101001
PixStat2 Pixel 4,6 - 0b10101001 to 0b10100001
PixStat6 Pixel 4,6 - 0b00000000 to 0b00000001
PixStat1 Pixel 8,6 - 0b11001000 to 0b00001000
PixStat2 Pixel 9,6 - 0b11010100 to 0b10010100
PixStat2 Pixel 13,6 - 0b10011100 to 0b10111100
PixStat5 Pixel 3,7 - 0b00000000 to 0b00000001
PixStat1 Pixel 4,7 - 0b11000110 to 0b10000110
PixStat2 Pixel 4,7 - 0b10011101 to 0b10011001
PixStat6 Pixel 6,7 - 0b00010000 to 0b10000000
PixStat2 Pixel 8,7 - 0b10010000 to 0b11011000
PixStat3 Pixel 0,8 - 0b01000001 to 0b01000000
PixStat6 Pixel 10,8 - 0b00000000 to 0b00000001
PixStat2 Pixel 11,8 - 0b10100010 to 0b10100110
PixStat5 Pixel 13,8 - 0b00000000 to 0b00001000
PixStat3 Pixel 9,9 - 0b11000001 to 0b11000000
PixStat1 Pixel 10,9 - 0b11000110 to 0b01000110
PixStat2 Pixel 4,10 - 0b10011000 to 0b10011001
PixStat1 Pixel 6,10 - 0b01000111 to 0b11000111
PixStat3 Pixel 8,10 - 0b11000001 to 0b11000000
PixStat2 Pixel 13,10 - 0b10010111 to 0b10011111
PixStat6 Pixel 13,10 - 0b00000000 to 0b00000001

PixStat5 Pixel 5,12 - 0b00000000 to 0b00000100
PixStat2 Pixel 11,12 - 0b10010011 to 0b10010001
